strings.HELP_INSTRUCTIONS: This is a small collection of APL feature demos. To see a demo just call select it by ordinal or by name
strings.PAGE_NOT_FOUND: I did not understand. Say show followed by demo name, for example: show profile or show video to see a feature in action
strings.PAGE_NOT_FOUND_REPROMPT: <speak>Say <emphasis level="moderate">Show,</emphasis><emphasis level="reduced"> folllowed by what ever demo you want to see </emphasis>.</speak>
ERROR: There was an error. Please try again
strings.ERROR_REPROMPT: <speak>Say <emphasis level="moderate">Show,</emphasis><emphasis level="reduced"> folllowed by what ever demo you want to see </emphasis>.</speak>
MAINMENU_REPROMPT: <speak>To see a demo, say <emphasis level="moderate">Show, </emphasis><emphasis level="reduced"> folllowed by the feature name.</emphasis>. For example, say <break strength="strong"/>Show profile </speak>

<speak>Say <emphasis level="moderate">Show,</emphasis><emphasis level="reduced"> folllowed by demo orginal to see that demo </emphasis>. For example, say <break strength="strong"/>Show eleven </speak>
strings.FALLBACK_TRIGGERED: I did not understand. Please try again
strings.FALLBACK_RETRY: <speak>Say <emphasis level="moderate">Show, </emphasis><emphasis level="reduced"> folllowed by the feature name.</emphasis>. For example, say <break strength="strong"/>Show text, to see the text demo</speak>

SHARED_PAGE.GOBACK: Say 'go back' to get back to main menu

PROFILE_PAGE.NAME: profile
PROFILE_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Shows properties of viewport profile that can be used for adaptive layouts

MAINMENU_PAGE.NAME: menu
MAINMENU_PAGE.TEXT: What feature from list below do you want to see?
MAINMENU_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: This is the skills navigation menu
MAINMENU_PAGE.REPROMPT: Say show followed by demo name, for example: show profile or show video

VIDEO_PAGE.NAME: video
VIDEO_PAGE.TEXT: Touch the buttons to see video commands in action

TEXT_PAGE.NAME: text
TEXT_PAGE.TEXT: This sample just showcases text formating options

TOUCHWRAPPER_PAGE.NAME: touchwrapper
TOUCHWRAPPER_PAGE.TEXT: click on the buttons and image to send events

IMAGE_PAGE.NAME: image
IMAGE_PAGE.TEXT: Here are some images with filters and overlays

STATES_PAGE.NAME: states
STATES_PAGE.TEXT: Components can be pressed, focused, disabled, and checked
STATES_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Component states: pressed, focused, disabled,  checked

SPINNER_PAGE.NAME: spinner
SPINNER_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Functional animation with SpeakItems and databinding

OPENURL_PAGE.NAME: openurl command
OPENURL_PAGE.TEXT: Amazon.com will be opened in 8 seconds. Say Go back to cancel it

ENVIRONMENT_PAGE.NAME: environment
ENVIRONMENT_PAGE.TEXT: These are the environment properties available for data binding

TICTACTOE_PAGE.NAME: tic tac toe
TICTACTOE_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Tic tac toe demo for containers, databinding and styles

VIDEOTRANSPORT_PAGE.NAME: transport controls
VIDEOTRANSPORT_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: Alexa layout implementation of video transport controls

DATABINDING_PAGE.NAME: databinding
DATABINDING_PAGE.DESCRIPTION: A data source is a JSON structure that defines data you can bind to an APL document

strings.ANAPHORICSELECTION: Anaphorically, you requested {0}, which maps to {1}
strings.INVALIDANAPHORICREQUEST: Sorry. I could not resolve your selection. Try asking for item by ordinal or by name
strings.INVALIDINDEXREQUEST: Sorry. I could not resolve your selection. Try saying Show followed by the demo name
